aboutMe.name: Ben Langenberg
aboutMe.about: I'm a developer who is currently focusing on my studies at the Hogeschool van Amsterdam. I'm majoring in Communication & Multimediadesign and currently looking for an internship focused on front-end/back-end development

list.description: Small application that fetches data from the Spotify API and renders the result to view using Handlebars. Service workers were implemented as an assignment during the minor Web Design & Development.

During the minor Web Design & Development our final assignment was the Meesterproef. The assignment was to develop an application for a stakeholder. For the stakeholder we developed a platform where illiterate people can get explanation of letters they receive from organisational bodies in their native language.
Pocket Tour Guide, a travel and planning app for sightseeing in various cities. Prototype made in Figma.
Personal portfolio website created using NextJS and Typescript.

Cmdmethods is a website that helps students with planning their UX research by providing various research techniques. The website was in need of a redesign. During my internship I helped redesigning the website and was responsible for building the design in Vue.js.
